dialogues.text:
Analyzing environment...
Soft surface detected.
Recommended ability: Triller.

The suit has a drilling mode.
When activated, it adapts to the shape
of a rotating cone.

Oh you meant the drilling mode.
Now you're using nicknames to my tools?

It doesn't matter,
It feels like I'm actually talking to someone
Okay, I'll use the 'Triller'
